response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its unique features and benefits, I firmly believe it's worth more than $800,000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and the long-term advantages it offers, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment in the product. I understand that making such a decision requires careful consideration, and I am here to provide any additional information or answer any questions you might have. Please let me know if you require further details or wish to discuss this further.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve mutual success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
